valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low far north of Biscay 1012 expected central Biscay 1015 by 0600 tomorrow. High 250 miles west of Sole 1032 expected Shannon with little change by same time
